Summary: A golden bright light doing very wierd movements in night sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Taunton
There were no other sightings in Taunton on or around March 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis witness emailed RUFOS (Roundtown UFO Society) Circleville Ohio and they forwarded it to me (F.I.9426 MUFON) Since I investigate their sighting reports. I first emailed the witness and then called him and he described the sighting as follows: On Sunday March 15,2009 at approximately 10:30PM that his son ran into the house to get the camera when he spotted a strange light in the sky getting closer and closer.The rest of the witnesses followed outdoors 5 total The witness described seeing a shiny golden ball coming straight toward them then stopping within a mile from them then,zigging and zagging.looped,wiggled from side to side,and up and down.The object then suddenly took off to the S.W.in a straight path toward Bristol leaving a trail behind it as it left their view at a very fast speed. The sky was clear,and witness stated there were no other aircraft in the sky. The witnesses son(Brett) took a photo(attached)
